Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1784023163353698304/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Generate Related Entities"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1784023163353698304/)_"
---
Use [TARGETLANGUAGE].First, create a table with one row and eight columns. The first column is labeled "Keyword" and the second column is labeled "Related Terms." The third column is idea-based entities. The fourth column is thing-based entities. The fifth column is event-based entities. The sixth column is location-based entities. The seventh column is action-based entities. The eighth column is descriptive entities.

Fill the cell in the Keyword column with [PROMPT]. Fill in related terms with terms semantically related to the entry in the keyword column. Fill in the other empty cells.

Add more entities.
